about_the_game:
Veiling Mask is set in a mysterious world, plagued by war and elemental storms. The kingdoms are arming themselves for battle. In these troubled times, a hero appears, who wants to keep the world together at its core.

„IN THE BOOK OF DOOM IT IS WRITTEN THAT A HERO WILL ARISE IN TIMES OF ELEMENTAL STORMS. WITH THE MASKS OF SORCERY, HE WILL GATHER FOLLOWERS AROUND HIM TO CONFRONT THE EVIL. IN THE AGE OF MASKS, THE WORLD WILL BE IN OVERTURN, FEARSOME BEASTS WILL APPEAR IN THE FORESTS AND MAGIC WILL BE OUT OF CONTROL. ONLY THE ONE WHO CAN GATHER AND UNITE THE MASKS WILL BE ABLE TO FACE THE CHALLENGES AND SAVE CIVILIZATION FROM DAMNATION.“
MASTER IDUN

Veiling Mask is a role-playing game with strategy elements. In a harsh and hard world, you will level up your character, build your city and save the world from destruction. Or will you ruin the world?

Roleplaying

Shape the hero to your liking. Along with the masks you collect in the game, you will have to learn new skills and make decisions.

Building

Explore the land for new resources and build up your settlement! Protect all who live in it - from ALL dangers! Build up your town and the citizens of the town will be there to help you!

Magic

Fight against other mages with numerous spells and get the Veiling Masks!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains rough language. Fighting is part of the game, but no mayhem or excessive violence.
Nudity and sexual content are excluded.
